scripts.prepare:local: mustache config/local.json subgraph.template.yaml > subgraph.yaml && mustache config/local.json src/common/constants.template.ts > src/common/constants.ts
scripts.prepare:mainnet: mustache config/mainnet.json subgraph.template.yaml > subgraph.yaml && mustache config/mainnet.json src/common/constants.template.ts > src/common/constants.ts
scripts.prepare:ropsten: mustache config/ropsten.json subgraph.template.yaml > subgraph.yaml && mustache config/ropsten.json src/common/constants.template.ts > src/common/constants.ts
scripts.deploy:local: yarn run codegen && graph create --node http://localhost:8020 euler/mainnet && graph deploy euler/mainnet ./subgraph.yaml --ipfs http://localhost:5001 --node http://localhost:8020
scripts.deploy:mainnet: yarn run codegen && graph deploy --node https://api.thegraph.com/deploy/ --ipfs https://thegraph.com/hosted-service/subgraph/hboisselle/messari-euler
scripts.deploy:ropsten: yarn run codegen && graph deploy --node https://api.thegraph.com/deploy/ --ipfs TODO
